data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Busan to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Busan's Lee Dong-jun misses with an attempt on goal.
Ji Um Cho awards Gangwon a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Gangwon.
Ji Um Cho signals a Gangwon throw-in in Busan's half.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Busan drive upfield and Kim Moon-hwan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gangwon defender.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
Busan drive forward but Gustavo Vintecinco is judged offside.
In the minute 6, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 9, Free kick Gangwon.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Busan's Gustavo Vintecinco has run offside.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
In the minute 14, Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in Gangwon.
In the minute 16, Gangwon attack but Cho Jae-wan's header doesn't find the target.
Busan have a goal kick.
Gangwon drives forward and Sin Se-gye gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Busan.
Busan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gangwon.
Kim Moon-hwan for Busan has been booked by Ji Um Cho and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 27, Ji Um Cho signals a Gangwon throw-in in Busan's half.
Romulo for Busan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Ji Um Cho awards the home team a throw-in.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Busan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
Kim Ji-hyeon (Gangwon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 36, Jung Suk-hwa (Gangwon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dostonbek Tursunov.
Dostonbek Tursunov is back on the pitch.
In the minute 39, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Free kick Busan.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 44, Gangwon are coming forward and Cho Jae-wan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In Busan, Busan push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Busan.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
At Asiad Main Stadium, Lee Dong-jun has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Corner awarded to Busan.
Romulo is back on his feet again.
In the minute 52, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Romulo for Busan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Byung-Soo Kim (Gangwon) is making a first substitution, with Ko Mu-yeol replacing Jung Suk-hwa.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Busan to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Busan.
In Busan Gangwon attack through Kim Ji-hyeon. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Busan.
In the minute 57, Cho Jae-wan puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Lee Hyeon-sik with an assist there.
Kim Seung-dae for Gangwon drives towards goal at Asiad Main Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, Gustavo Vintecinco (Busan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ji Um Cho awards Gangwon a goal kick.
Busan apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Romulo. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 61, Gangwon's Kim Seung-dae is on target but unsuccessful.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In Busan, Im Chai-min (Gangwon) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 62, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Goal kick for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Duk-Jae Cho is making the team's first substitution at Asiad Main Stadium with Jeong Seong-min replacing Lee Kyu-seong.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
Gangwon needs to be cautious. Busan have an attacking throw-in.
Busan push forward at Asiad Main Stadium and Gustavo Vintecinco gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gangwon defence.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Busan.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Kim Dong-woo.
Romulo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Gangwon's Kim Yeong-bin breaks free at Asiad Main Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Busan.
Kim Ji-hyeon (Gangwon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
In the minute 74, Ji Um Cho signals a Gangwon throw-in in Busan's half.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 78, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Gangwon are pushing forward but Ko Mu-yeol's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
The away team have replaced Kim Seung-dae with Lee Yeong-jae. This is the second substitution made today by Byung-Soo Kim.
Kwon Hyeok-kyu is replacing Kim Byong-oh for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 79, In Busan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Busan attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Gustavo Vintecinco but the ball cannons into the bar!
Goal kick for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji Um Cho awards Gangwon a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Gangwon take a 1-2 lead thanks to Lee Yeong-jae.
That's a fine assist from Cho Jae-wan.
Busan's Kim Moon-hwan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gangwon defender.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 87, Gangwon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Dostonbek Tursunov (Busan) has received a yellow card from Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 89, Free kick in a good position for Gangwon!
Lee Ho-in is replacing Cho Jae-wan for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
Ji Um Cho signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Busan's area.
Busan have a goal kick.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Busan, Lee Yeong-jae of Gangwon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Kim Seung-jun is replacing Romulo for the home team.
